Worksheet 7: Delegation Plan

Instructions:

* Use the following worksheet to create a delegation plan for your business and homeschooling.
* Identify tasks that can be delegated and assign them to specific team members or service providers.

Delegating tasks can be an effective way to free up time and focus on important activities. However, delegation requires careful planning and communication to ensure that tasks are completed effectively and efficiently. Use this worksheet to create a delegation plan for your business and homeschooling.

| Task | Can it be delegated? | Who will be responsible? | Deadline | Follow-up plan |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Answering emails and phone calls | Yes | Virtual assistant | End of day | Check emails before end of day |
| Social media management | Yes | Social media manager | Weekly | Review performance weekly |
| Bookkeeping and accounting | Yes | Accountant | Monthly | Review reports monthly |
| Content creation (blogs, videos, social media posts) | Yes | Content creator | Bi-weekly | Review content before posting |
| Lesson planning and grading | Yes | Tutor | Weekly | Review grades and progress weekly |
| Cleaning and household chores | Yes | Cleaning service | Bi-weekly | Check quality of cleaning bi-weekly |

To create your delegation plan, start by listing the tasks that can be delegated in your business and homeschooling. Use the "Can it be delegated?" column from Worksheet 6 to help you with this. Then, assign each task to a specific team member or service provider. Make sure to communicate the details of each task, including deadlines and expectations.

Once you have assigned tasks to specific team members or service providers, create a follow-up plan to ensure that tasks are completed effectively and efficiently. Use the "Deadline" and "Follow-up plan" columns to help you with this. Be sure to communicate regularly with team members and service providers to ensure that tasks are on track and to provide feedback.

By completing this delegation plan, you'll have a clear understanding of which tasks can be delegated and who will be responsible for completing them. You'll also have a plan in place to ensure that tasks are completed effectively and efficiently. Use this worksheet to take action towards delegating tasks and freeing up more time for important activities.
